title: Best Alternatives to PathAI - Healthcare AI Platforms 2026
metaDescription: Compare PathAI alternatives. Explore verified healthcare AI platforms for medical professionals.

mainPlatform.name: PathAI
mainPlatform.description: AI-powered pathology platform for improving diagnostic accuracy and drug development.
strengths: Specializes in AI-powered pathology and diagnostics

alternatives.name: Aidoc
alternatives.description: AI-powered radiology platform for prioritizing and flagging acute abnormalities in medical imaging.
alternatives.knownFor: Radiology AI for triage and prioritization of critical findings

alternatives.name: Viz.ai
alternatives.description: AI-powered care coordination platform that synchronizes stroke care and other time-sensitive treatments.
alternatives.knownFor: Stroke detection and care coordination platform

alternatives.name: Tempus
alternatives.description: AI-enabled precision medicine platform that analyzes clinical and molecular data to personalize treatments.
alternatives.knownFor: Precision medicine and genomic data analysis

alternatives.name: Butterfly Network
alternatives.description: Combines ultrasound hardware with AI software for medical imaging and diagnostics.
